title: Electric field enhances the electronic and diffusion properties of penta-graphene nanoribbon anodes in lithium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33524-33535
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05464D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi Nhan Tran, Nguyen Vo Anh Duy, Nguyen Hoang Hieu, Truc Anh Nguyen, Nguyen To Van, Thi Viet Bac Phung, Yohandys A. Zulueta, Minh Tho Nguyen, Peter Schall, Minh Triet Dang
Under external electric fields, first principles calculations show a significant enhancement of the ionic conductivity and diffusion coefficients of penta-graphene nanoribbon anodes for fast-charging lithium-ion batteries.
